```{r}
getwd()
dir <- file.path(getwd(),"Point level data")
out <- read.csv(file.path(dir, "MU-BU-Ghana.csv"))
summary(out)
head(out)
newout <- na.omit(out)
```

What is the best way for us to deal with the missing data point? I just omitted the observation. 

```{r1}
pr.data <- prcomp(x = newout[,29:80], scale = TRUE, center = TRUE)
summary(pr.data) 
biplot(pr.data)
plot(pr.data, type='l')
pr.var <- pr.data$sdev^2
pve <- pr.var/sum(pr.var)
plot(pve)
plot(cumsum(pve))
```
